author: abcoathup
content:
When an EIP is merged, it just means that an EIP editor has reviewed, it doesn't have validation errors and is deemed good enough to be a draft.  

You could reach out to the EIP authors of an EIP that interests you to see if you can contribute.

Also try joining a breakout call on something you find interesting: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues

Consider applying for Ethereum Protocol Fellowship: https://epf.wiki/#/wiki/epf?id=ethereum-protocol-fellowship
